title: 5 stories you must read today, November 17: From 45 pilgrims killed in Saudi Arabia bus accident to SC asking Centre to decide on ratifying UN cybercrime treaty
text: Forty-five pilgrims from Hyderabad, who were on umrah, died in a bus accident in Saudi Arabia early on Monday when they were travelling from Mecca to Medina. Control rooms have been set up in the Secretariat and Telangana Bhavan in Delhi to provide appropriate information and assistance to the families of the victims. One person has reportedly survived the crash. Read more
